title: 有什么MOD是可以让生存难一些的吗？
author: 名侦探kenan
txt_content: 有什么MOD是可以让生存难一些的吗？格雷的就不要谈了.......{:10_495:}

replies.author: 世奇真身
replies.txt_content: 月球可以看看？我没玩过233333

replies.author: misaki丶mei
replies.txt_content: 生活调味剂,蜥蜴人的阴谋

replies.author: Wolverine
replies.txt_content: 好像有一个MOD叫“群木传说”那个会让生存变得无比的难

replies.author: 冬瓜茶
replies.txt_content: minecraft is to easy和BTW玩过了吗？

replies.author: Chikerenaham
replies.txt_content: Ultra Modded Survival，一个technic modpack
僵尸意志可以让生存难一点点，你试试吧

replies.author: Chikerenaham
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Chikerenaham 于 2014-11-14 22:09 编辑 

喔，还有：


Hunger Overhaul (需要AppleCore )

InfernoMobs


Localized Weather and Storm Fronts

replies.author: qwe1212456
replies.txt_content: 群峦传说！

replies.author: 天正鹄
replies.txt_content: 饥饿，僵尸

replies.author: 世界来了
replies.txt_content: 饮水 僵尸 苦力怕

replies.author: qq1776078653
replies.txt_content: 僵尸意识 精英怪 更多僵尸 元素苦力怕

replies.author: MZT小修丶
replies.txt_content: 变异怪物

replies.author: chenzhanghan
replies.txt_content: 远陆世界+一些增加怪物难度的MOD，例如最常见的僵尸意志

replies.author: him迷
replies.txt_content: 真实世界MOD

replies.author: him迷
replies.txt_content:
除了真实世界MOD还有更多怪物MOD，比如：更多僵尸MOD、更多蜘蛛MOD（就是加强怪物的MOD）
还有突变生物MOD

replies.author: 无の聊
replies.txt_content: 我好像看到过灾害MOD就是不知道在哪里了

replies.author: 1258400122@qq.c
replies.txt_content: 布吉岛啊

replies.author: w253307725

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: huonan00925
replies.txt_content: 真实环境MOD，里面有饮水，温度等

replies.author: DY小诺
replies.txt_content: 去下贝爷mod保证玩疯还有环境mod 自然灾害  末日

replies.author: 天神8王者
replies.txt_content: 贝爷极限生存！！！坑死你！！

replies.author: gudan22168
replies.txt_content: UHC疯狂极限 无法回血的极限生存 再来个僵尸意志尸潮精英怪

replies.txt_content:
UHC
远陆时代
格雷
僵尸意志

replies.txt_content:

格雷
